article_title: Highlights, lowlights of the 2016 Idaho Legislature
article_text:
One for three on action regarding education, taxes, health care

Busy and active in a typically short election year session

Success on education, public defense reform, but no action on health care

article_metadata.news-keywords: Idaho Legislature, 2016 session, Medicad expansion, education funding, tax cuts, public defense reform, REAL ID, plastic bag ban, urban renewal reform, HOAs, permitless concealed carry, Sharia law, water rights, abortion
article_metadata.description: Idaho’s Legislature had many small successes in 2016 but one major fumble, dropping the ball on any substantive plan to address lack of health care for 78,000 poor Idahoans. Lawmakers restored school funding to pre-recession levels, but on social and governance issues largely stuck to their conservative leanings in a short, election-year session.
article_metadata.title: Highlights, lowlights of the 2016 Idaho Legislature | Idaho Statesman
